item.title: Haskell
item.description: Structure of a main script with let and do syntax. Save in a script e.g. example.hs 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 main :: IO () main = do let printString = "Hi" number = 3 putStrLn printString (putStrLn . show) number To compile and run we use stack exec -- runghc example.hs
